To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MeanAbsoluteDeviation _mad;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_mad = MAD(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_mad.IsReady)
{
    var mean = _mad.Mean.Value;
    var period = _mad.Period.Value;
    var current = _mad.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.mad = self.MAD(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.mad.IsReady:
    mean = self.mad.Mean.Value
    period = self.mad.Period.Value
    current = self.mad.Current.Value
